intro: Erycibe, commonly known as the red hibiscus, is a genus of flowering plants in the mallow family, Malvaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas, particularly Central and South America. Erycibe species are valued for their ornamental beauty and are sometimes cultivated for their vibrant blooms.
